Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.23161023]HSV-2 acyclovir-sensitive strain(911411):inhibition the cytopathic effect(CPE) of HSV-2 in Vero cells(EC50=2.7 μM);HSV-2 acyclovir-resistant strain(ROI2):inhibition of cytopathic effet(CPE) of HSV-2 in Vero cells(EC50=5.1 μM).

Literature.Title: In vitro antiviral activity of dermaseptin S(4) and derivatives from amphibian skin against herpes simplex virus type 2.
Literature.Author: Bergaoui I, Zairi A, Tangy F, Aouni M, Selmi B, Hani K.
